description:
Reentrancy in AuctionHouse.raise(uint256,uint256,bool) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#145-159):
	External calls:
	- USDC.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),price + $.auctions[auctionId].fee) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#154)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Raised(auctionId,msg.sender,price) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#158)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [AuctionHouse.raise(uint256,uint256,bool)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L145-L159):
	External calls:
	- [USDC.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),price + $.auctions[auctionId].fee)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L154)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Raised(auctionId,msg.sender,price)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L158)

description:
Reentrancy in AuctionHouse.raise(uint256,uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#161-176):
	External calls:
	- USDC.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),price + fee) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#170)
	- USDC.safeTransfer($.auctions[auctionId].buyer,oldPrice + fee) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#171)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Raised(auctionId,msg.sender,price) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#175)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [AuctionHouse.raise(uint256,uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L161-L176):
	External calls:
	- [USDC.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),price + fee)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L170)
	- [USDC.safeTransfer($.auctions[auctionId].buyer,oldPrice + fee)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L171)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Raised(auctionId,msg.sender,price)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L175)

description:
AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#203-207) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- $.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#206)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L203-L207) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [$.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L206)

description:
AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#215-219) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endTime <= block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#216)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L215-L219) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [endTime <= block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L216)

description:
EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes) (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#30-46) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- deadline <= block.timestamp (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#36)
markdown:
[EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes)](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L30-L46) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [deadline <= block.timestamp](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L36)
